snippet: A 23-year-student was beaten by villagers who believed he had stolen an animal meant to be sacrificed in honor of the goddess Kali, the police said.
lead_paragraph: A 23-year-student was beaten by villagers who believed he had stolen an animal meant to be sacrificed in honor of the goddess Kali, the police said.

headline.main: Accused of Water Buffalo Theft, and Killed in India Village
